system.description: Once per session, the explorer can spend a Fate Point and gain the benefits of a Talent an ally possess, or grant the benefits of a Talent they possess to an ally. Neither the ally nor the character must meet any requirements the Talent possesses. This effect persists until the end of the encounter.
system.benefit: Once per session, you can spend a Fate Point to either gain the benefits of a Talent an ally possesses, or grant the benefits of a Talent you possess to an ally. Neither you nor the ally must meet any requirements the Talent possesses. This effect persists until the end of the encounter.

specialAbilities.name: Shared Talent Mastery
specialAbilities.description: Once per session, spend a Fate Point to either copy a Talent from an ally or share one of your Talents with an ally. Neither character needs to meet the Talent's requirements. Effect lasts until the end of the encounter.
